featured.text: They also like to make their mounds in sunny areas, heavily infesting lawns and pastures.
She sometimes helps fertilize the lawn outside the sauna.
As a side benefit, the birds also fertilize the lawn outside the new employee sauna.

definition.zh_def: 草坪，通常指修剪整齊的草地，常用於庭院或公園。
definition.en_def: A lawn is an area of grass that is regularly mowed and maintained, typically found in gardens or parks.
definition.example: The children played on the green lawn in the backyard.
